<br>

# Introduction

:::{note}
This is a brief introduction to the code of practice pages
:::

These pages ensure the team use the same conventions and principles for

> * Considering machine learning, data science, projects; especially writing a pre-project design document, i.e., project 
> scope document for conducting a feasibility assessment.  The feasibility study determines whether to proceed.
> * Considering data intelligence project.
> * Designing, developing, and deploying data products within a continuous integration, delivery, and deploment setting.
> * Coding, or rather software development.
> * Naming GitHub repositories.


<br>
